Package component

Class AnimatedSprite

java.lang.Object
component.AnimatedSprite
public class AnimatedSprite extends Object
Handles a single animation. It compiles sprite into single animation.
Author:
Dave Jimenez

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimatedSprite

      public AnimatedSprite​(javafx.scene.image.Image[] textures, int fps, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new AnimatedSprite. A constructor that uses x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      textures - ( Image[] ) An array of Image objects.
      fps - ( int ) Determines the speed of the animation.
      x - ( double ) Starting x position.
      y - ( double ) Starting y position.
      width - ( double ) The width of the sprite.
      height - ( double ) The height of the sprite.

    • AnimatedSprite

      public AnimatedSprite​(javafx.scene.image.Image[] textures, int fps, Vector2 position, Vector2 size)
      Creates a new AnimatedSprite. A constructor that uses vector.
      Parameters:
      textures - ( Image[] ) An array of Image objects.
      fps - ( int ) Determines the speed of the animation.
      position - ( Vector2 ) Starting vector position.
      size - ( Vector2 ) The vector size.

  • Method Details

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the AnimatedSprite and resets current frame to the first frame.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the AnimatedSprite at the specified frame. Defaults at the first frame.

    • start

      public void start​(int frame)
      Starts the AnimatedSprite at the specified frame. Defaults at the first frame.
      Parameters:
      frame - ( int ) The frame to be rendered.

    • render

      public void render​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders the AnimatedSprite into the Canvas.
      Parameters:
      gc - ( GraphicsContext ) GraphicsContext of the canvas.
